name: security-shifts
description: Production-ready security services shift management system

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev -w api" "npm run dev -w web"
scripts.dev:replit: PORT=4000 npm run dev:api & npm run dev:web
scripts.build: npm run build -w api && npm run build -w web
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start -w api" "npm start -w web"
scripts.lint: npm run lint -w api && npm run lint -w web
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check -w api && npm run type-check -w web
